statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM transportation_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM transportation_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM transportation_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT contact_id, contact_name, contact_phone FROM transportation_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_contacts WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM transportation_contacts WHERE contact_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM transportation_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT contact_id, contact_name FROM transportation_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM transportation_contacts WHERE contact_phone = '123-456-7890' AND contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT name, email FROM partners;
SELECT id, name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT company_name, email FROM partners WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM stakeholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM partners WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contacts ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT company_name, company_type, location FROM companies WHERE company_type = 'Tech';
SELECT id, communication_date, sender_id, receiver_id FROM communications WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, location FROM companies WHERE company_type = 'Tech';
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, comm.message FROM contacts c JOIN communications comm ON c.id = comm.sender_id;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT name, email FROM partners ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, name, phone FROM stakeholders WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT name, email FROM partners ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM contacts WHERE phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM stakeholders JOIN partners ON stakeholders.id = partners.id;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT id, name, email FROM partners WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT message FROM communications WHERE sender_id = 101 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, date FROM meetings WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Office%';
SELECT recipient_id, message FROM notifications WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, email FROM partners WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, message FROM communications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Conference%';
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE recipient_id = 100 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
